General.Name: XiAn Typical Industries Co Ltd
General.Description: Xi'an Typical Industries Co.,Ltd engages in the research and development, production, and sale of industrial sewing machines in China. The company offers lockstitch, overlock, chainstitch, and heavy-duty sewing machines, as well as automatic sewing units, garment and non-garment sewing machines, stand and table, and spare parts. Its products are used in manufacturing knitting, clothing, suitcases, and boxes. The company also exports its products to Asia, the United States, Europe, Africa, and internationally. The company was founded in 1946 and is based in Xi'an, China.
General.Address: East side of Qinling, Xi'an, China, 710612
